abstract: Before Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras gets any euro zone deal on Greece’s public debt, he could make good on his promise of a permanent mortgage moratorium, write George Hay and Neil Unmack of Reuters Breakingviews.

byline.original: By GEORGE HAY and NEIL UNMACK

snippet: Before Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras gets any euro zone deal on Greece’s public debt, he could make good on his promise of a permanent mortgage moratorium, write George Hay and Neil Unmack of Reuters Breakingviews.

headline.main: A Way to Hasten Bank Reform in Greece
